p: The three α-biodiversity indices showed similar tendencies and were significantly higher in 2010 ( D = 0.837 ± 0.058, H = 0.328 ± 0.039, and E = 0.182 ± 0.023; means ± SE) ( p < 0.05) than in 2014 ( D = 0.686 ± 0.026, H = 0.269 ± 0.005, and E = 0.105 ± 0.007; means ± SE) and 2018 ( D = 0.663 ± 0.016, H = 0.246 ± 0.006, and E = 0.099 ± 0.003; means ± SE) ( Figure 3). The three α-biodiversity indices did not show dramatic differences between 2014 and 2018 ( Figure 3).
